name: Cha-0
description:
Cha-0

You play as Cha-0, a robot that has awakened in an abandoned factory, and is trying to get out of the factory. However, the only way to move Cha-0 is programming blocks. You are given a set of action blocks and a compiler screen, and in order to control Cha-0, you must place the action blocks in the compiler and the actions run in sequence. 

You are the processor
  • Be Cha-0's processor and give Cha-0 commands with the compiler to solve puzzles.
  • Be a smart processor to come out with the most optimize solutions with 2 compilers.
  • Unlock achivements as you play throughout the game.
